alert.note: Alert for Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 2:09PM PST until March 05 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong Winds Late This Afternoon and Evening... .A strong cold front will make its way across northern California this afternoon and evening causing strong westerly winds through the Carquinez Strait and Delta and into the Southern Sacramento Valley and Northern San Joaquin Valley. ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts 35 to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Carquinez Strait, the Sacramento Delta and the Northern San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Gusty winds could impact high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley
